extendedInfo.description: Fruit Puzzle is a very challenging puzzle game.How to play:Your goalEach level is a logic puzzle. Your goal is to clear the game board using your inventory fruits. Pick fruit from inventory one by one and place them on the gameboard cellsCombining fruitsTo clear fruits from the gameboard you need to arrange them in different combinations. For example, pears will explode in lines of 3.Organizing chainsWhen fruits explode, other nearby elements may shift to neighboring cells, thus setting off a new explosion. Use this behavior to organize chain reactionsTry your best to finish all 40 levels.More levels are coming soon

reviews.title: Its fun but...
reviews.comment: I really like this game, but i cant get past level 16! How do you get the tomatoes to move? the game really needs hints. You would think help would help but no, of course not!
reviews.author: Rebecca Henry

reviews.comment: It\'s fun, but bugs on level 40 oranges effect as below said, Plx fix it. And hope can add more level
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love it except level 40

reviews.comment: Fun. Addictive. Bt i cant pass level 7. Someone plz help!

reviews.comment: Very good game except level 40, I can\'t work it out. I thought the help option may help but doesn\'t

reviews.comment: It is a very good brain game. Level 16 was very challenging and after an hr I cracked it.. nice game...

reviews.title: Very frustrating addictive lol
reviews.comment: The first 21 levels are the hardest to figure out, but after that it gets super easy until you reach 39 and 40 (the final two levels). It can be done.

reviews.title: needs hints badly
reviews.comment: Not a bad game but really needs hints to help out. If ur stuck u can\'t continue and you can\'t get help. That\'s frustrating.

reviews.title: Excellent puzzle game
reviews.comment: Starts easy and builds through level 20, the easy again for a while. Level 40 is tough, but possible. What seems the simplest move isn\'t always right.
